timeline.message:
Refine deduplicating logic in lifecycle change requests.

When a service receives restart and start in sequence, 'start' may override the 'restart'.
This can cause merge-config doesn't restart service as expected.

timeline.bodyText:
I know EvergreenService class is special but I still think we should avoid testing with checking an private field. As Jamie said,

please don’t write unit tests that are “Is the code implemented this way”.

Checking a private field basically makes the code needs to be implemented in a very particular way.
Moreover, changing the content of a private field during the test actually changes the logic of real code, which defeats the purpose of unit test...
timeline.author: leaf94

replies.bodyText: I agree with Ethan there. This test looks really fragile. Can we just write integration tests instead if unit tests are difficult to write. I much prefer integration tests than fragile unit tests.
